sentence.Network_cn: 我们彻底仔细地检查了措词后才最终定稿。

sentence.Network_cn: 正文开头的文字让我们颇为担心。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old Northern French texte, from Latin textus 'tissue, literary style' (in medieval Latin, 'Gospel'), from text- 'woven', from the verb texere

encyclopedia.content: TEXT是Windows程序设计中经常会遇到的一个宏，在winnt.h中定义。 TCHAR *ptch = TEXT("This is a const string."); 如果使用UNICODE字符集， 则TEXT("This is a const string.")相当于L"This is a const string."， 如果使用ASCII集， 则上述字符串相当于“This is a const string.”。这样， 写的程序既可以使用UNICODE， 也可以使用ASCII， 增强了移植性。 在写windows应用程序时， 如果您不确定

entry.def: The text of a book is the main part of it, rather than the introduction, pictures, or notes.

example.ex: The text is precise and informative.
example.tran: 正文内容准确，信息量大。

example.ex: The machine can recognise handwritten characters and turn them into printed text...
example.tran: 这种机器能够识别手写字体，并将其转化为打印文本。

example.ex: A CD-ROM can store more than 250,000 pages of typed text.
example.tran: 一张只读光盘能存储25万多页键入的文本。

entry.tran: (讲演、广播、录音的)文字稿，原稿
entry.def: The text of a speech, broadcast, or recording is the written version of it.

example.ex: A spokesman said a text of Dr Runcie's speech had been circulated to all of the bishops.
example.tran: 一位发言人说，朗西博士的演讲稿已经分发给所有主教了。

entry.tran: (尤指科学或学术方面的)文献，文本
entry.def: A text is a book or other piece of writing, especially one connected with science or learning.

example.ex: Her text is believed to be the oldest surviving manuscript by a female physician.
example.tran: 她的文献据信是现存最古老的、由女性内科医生留下的手稿。

entry.tran: (尤指学校课堂使用的)课文，课文录音;(考卷上的)选文，录音材料
entry.def: A text is a written or spoken passage, especially one that is used in a school or university for discussion or in an examination.

example.ex: I'll read the text aloud first...
His early plays are set texts in universities.
example.tran: 他早期的戏剧作品现在是大学指定课文。

entry.def: A text is the same as a text message .

example.ex: I borrowed my wife's mobile phone last week and a text arrived from another man.
example.tran: 我上周借我老婆的手机用，收到一个男人发来的短信。

entry.def: If you text someone, you send them a text message on a mobile phone.

example.ex: Mary texted me when she got home.
example.tran: 玛丽到家后给我发了条短信。

sentences.sentence: "there were more than a thousand words of text"
"they handed out the printed text of the mayor's speech"
"he wants to reconstruct the original text"

means.word_mean: 2. a passage from the Bible that is used as the subject of a sermon;

sentences.sentence: "the preacher chose a text from Psalms to introduce his sermon"

means.word_mean: 3. a book prepared for use in schools or colleges;

sentences.sentence: "his economics textbook is in its tenth edition"
"the professor wrote the text that he assigned students to buy"

means.word_mean: 4. the main body of a written work (as distinct from illustrations or footnotes etc.);

sentences.sentence: "pictures made the text easier to understand"

stems_affixes.value_cn: [文章等]前后关系;[事件等发生的]背景
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+text编织→共同编织在一起的
pre预先+text编织→预先编好的→借口
text[n.正文,文本;原文;教科书]+book书→n.教科书, 课本

stems_affixes.word_buile: text编织+ure表名词→编织的状态→结构

sentences.en: Our newspaper is printing the full text of the President's speech.
sentences.cn: 我们的报纸刊登了总统讲话的全文。

sentences.en: He is reading a text in chemistry.
Today, I texted my boyfriend to see if he wanted to finally have supper today.
sentences.cn: 今天，我发短信给我的男友，问他到底想不想一起吃晚饭。

jushi.english: Our newspaper is printing the full text of the President's speech.
jushi.chinese: 我们的报纸将刊登总统发言的全文。

jushi.english: Hamlet is a set text for this year's English exam.
jushi.chinese: 《哈姆雷特》是今年英语考试的规定课本。

jushi.english: He preached on a text from St. John's Gospel .
jushi.chinese: 他以《圣约翰福音》中的文句作讲道的题目。
